mentionedBy.name: Jamf Holding Corp.
mentionedBy.notes: Premier Apple-focused MDM alternative founded 2018. Offers streamlined automation with pre-built Blueprints, eliminating complexity of manual configuration. Zero-touch deployment to compliance enforcement

mentionedBy.name: Jamf Holding Corp.
mentionedBy.notes: Premier Apple-focused alternative to Jamf. Offers streamlined automation through pre-built Blueprints that eliminate manual configuration complexity. Provides out-of-the-box templates for compliance, security policies, and device setup without requiring custom scripting like Jamf.
